Header: JVP Supremo Anura Kumara in hospital
Content: Janatha Vimukthi Peramuna (JVP) Leader and Chief Opposition Whip Anura Kumara Dissanayake was admitted to Sri Jayawardenepura Hospital last night following a sudden illness. Mr. Anura Kumara Dissanayakeâ€™s condition was not serious. He is said to be suffering of an attack of gastritis. He was expected to undergo some medical tests, Party sources states.
